content.rendered:
[vc_row type=”container”][vc_column width=”1/2″][vc_column_text]The Ikegami MKC-230 is a 3 chip medical grade FHD video camera. It uses a standard C-mount, and is compatible with all of our Accu-Beam® video adapters.

  • Full HD Resolution (1080p)
  • 1/3″ 3-chip CMOS sensor
  • Optional USB & SD recording upgrade with footswitch
  • Standard C-mount
  • F14 light sensitivity (with high sensitivity setting)
  • HDMI (using DVI-HDMI cable), DVI, and HD-SDI outputs
  • 5, 7, and 10 meter extension cables available

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″][vc_gallery type=”flexslider_slide” interval=”3″ images=”73763″ img_size=”400×267″ css=”.vc_custom_1588025997962{padding-top: 0px !important;}”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row type=”container”][vc_column][vc_separator color=”#e5e5e5″ type=”normal” thickness=”1″ up=”” down=””][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row type=”container”][vc_column][vc_column_text]

Ikegami MKC-230

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text]Capture high quality retinal videos at an affordable price. The Ikegami MKC-230 is an excellent entry level 3 chip video camera for those who are seeking a high sensitivity medical camera. While it does not have native HDMI out, a DVI to HDMI cable can be included to work with any monitor.

Compatible with all of our Accu-Beam® adapters the MKC-230 can be configured to any magnification you prefer, with the option for optical zoom for the best video experience.

The full specifications for the MKC-230 can be found here.

Sample videos can be found on our YouTube page.

Part # MKC-230HD[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row type=”container”][vc_column][vc_tta_tabs color=”white” active_section=”1″][vc_tta_section title=”Compatibility” tab_id=”1569386751404-824b66ba-0d54ee1a-7e6b36cc-98a1″][vc_column_text]

Compatible with all of our Accu-Beam® video adapters.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section title=”Regulatory” tab_id=”1569386751419-a33a2db6-6e3dee1a-7e6b36cc-98a1″][vc_column_text]Ikegami C-mount cameras are class 1 devices, and are approved to bear the CE mark.

TTI Medical is registered with the FDA and ISO 13485:2016 certified.[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section title=”Warranty” tab_id=”1569387831165-1b59dea1-014aee1a-7e6b36cc-98a1″][vc_column_text]

Ikegami C-mount cameras include a 3 year manufacturer’s warranty.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][/vc_tta_tabs][/vc_column][/vc_row]
